traits.Indomitable (2/Day): The champion rerolls a failed saving throw.
traits.Second Wind (Recharges after a Short or: As a bonus action, the champion can regain 20 hit points.

actions.Multiattack: The champion makes three attacks with its greatsword or its shortbow.
actions.Greatsword: Melee Weapon Attack: +9+1d8 + 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) slashing damage, plus 7 (2d6) slashing damage if the champion has more than half of its total hit points remaining.
actions.Shortbow: Ranged Weapon Attack: +6+1d8 + 2 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage, plus 7 (2d6) piercing damage if the champion has more than half of its total hit points remaining.
